name: Fatima
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: I love you. I love your voice—it’s like my favorite sound, i really like it. I love the way you talk, the way your words feel so genuine and comforting, like they’re meant just for me. And honestly, I love everything about you—your smile, your energy, your presence. I want to stay with you always, Insha Allah, and have a happy ending together
